SELECT DELIVERY_CODE, (SELECT CURRENT_LOC FROM DELIVERYMAN d WHERE DELIVERYMAN_ID = #{email}) AS CURRENT_LOC , DELIVERY_START, DELIVERY_ARRIVE FROM DELIVERY d2 WHERE DELIVERYMAN_ID = #{email}
